text: Juan Carlos Trujillo (born July 17, 1985) is a Guatemalan marathon runner. He placed 67th in the men's marathon at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Guatemalan male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Guatemala Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Central American Games gold medalists for Guatemala Category:Central American Games medalists in athletics Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Guatemala Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Guatemala
title: Juan Carlos Trujillo
